dict.string: on openPhotos(filepath) tell application "iPhoto" activate select photo library album set view to import tab set view to organize tab select (the first photo whose image path is filepath) set view to edit tab end tell end openPhotos
on openPhotos(filepath) tell application "Photos" activate spotlight filepath end tell end openPhotos

on openPhotos(filepath) tell application "iPhoto" activate select photo library album set view to organize select (the first photo whose image path is filepath) set view to edit end tell end openPhotos
